EmailTemplate.name: 20183_FSEIntro_joe_LG.20183_FSEIntro_joe_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Your Frimary Field Service Engineer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> MEET YOUR PRIMARY FSE IN THE FIELD Hello, As your Honeywell customer support manager, I’m excited to introduce you to {{lead.FSE/Intiator name:default=Blank}}, who is your primary direct field service engineer. You can still take advantage of the 24/7 global technical support network, but as the FSE in your area, {{lead.FSE/Intiator First Name:default=Blank}} will be your go-to contact when available. We’re confident this will provide you with additional support where and when you need it. {{lead.FSE/Intiator First Name:default=Blank}} can be reached by phone at {{lead.FSE/Intiator Phone:default=Blank}}. In addition, we’ll be reaching out to you over the next few weeks to introduce you to him. As always, if for some reason, he's unavailable, you can always take advantage of the responsive 24/7 technical support network by contacting us through www.MyAerospace.honeywell.com <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>, calling 1-855-808-6500 or e-mailing aerotechsupport@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aerotechsupport@honeywell.com]]>.
If you have questions, please contact me.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/R00q00oI0G002000QQXh7Z0]]>
